name: Classic Pro Racket
description: Engineered for the player who demands precision without compromise. The Classic Pro delivers a clean, connected feel on every stroke.

name: Court Session Tee
description: Heavyweight cotton tee with minimal branding. Designed to look as good off-court as on.

name: Match Day Shorts
description: Technical match shorts with a clean silhouette. Quick-dry ripstop fabric with laser-cut ventilation.

name: Signature Racket Bag
description: Built to carry everything you need and nothing you don't. Padded racket compartments, ventilated shoe pocket.

name: Tour Series Racket
description: For the advanced player who shapes every ball. Dense string bed for maximum spin control and precision placement.

name: Warm-Up Hoodie
description: Premium French terry hoodie. Oversized fit for warm-ups and everything after.

name: Pro Overgrip 3-Pack
description: Ultra-tacky overgrip that holds up in any conditions. No-slip performance from first point to match point.

name: Court Cap
description: Unstructured 6-panel cap with embroidered logo. Worn in, not broken in.
